T02n2965u_001:0: paṇḍita abhayākaraguptapādānām Kālacakrāvatāraḥ [ 1B ] om namo mañjuśriye |
T02n2965u_001:2: nīrūparūpādimayaṁ śarīraṁ jainaṁ nijaṁ sārvajanaṁ namāmi |
T02n2965u_001:4: tāthāgatābhyantariva sfuranti jyotīṣi tānyadya tamo jayanti ||
T02n2965u_001:6: iha hi mātsaryopahataistīrthikaijyotiṣe siddhāntaṁ guptīkṛtya bahuprapañcaṁ laghukaraṇaṁ kṛtamapīdānīṁ na jñāyata iti tatpratipādyate |
T02n2965u_001:8: śuklapratipadādicaitramāsādivarṣa yadā syāt tadānena tanmiśraṁ kāryam |
T02n2965u_001:13: tanmiśraṁ dvisthāne kṛtyadhasthaṁ caturhataṁ khāgnicandrairvibhaktaṁ bhāgaśeṣe lopaṁ labdhalabdhe mūrdhni praviṣṭe sati |
T02n2965u_001:15: yadā tu dvi varṣā syāt tadā trayodaśamāsaiḥ varṣaṁ kārye māsadvayamekaṁ gaṇanīyam |
T02n2965u_001:17: taṁ śuddhamāsapiṇḍaṁ tristhānai datvā karaśikhihato madhyasthe'dhaḥ sthāt ṣaḍbhāgaiḥ labdhaṁ viśodhyam |
T02n2965u_001:20: atrādhaḥ sthāt triṁśanmiśrāt ṣaṣṭhibhāgairlabdhaṁ mūrdhni dvimiśre praveśyam |
T02n2965u_001:24: punaḥ śuddhamāsapiṇḍaṁ dvādaśottaraśatamiśraṁ dvisthāne kṛtvā adhaḥ sthādṛturavibhāgaśeṣaḥ piṇḍāvayavaḥ syāt |
T02n2965u_001:25: bhāgalabdhaṁ pañcamiśraṁ mūrdhni dvi hatau deyam |
T02n2965u_001:26: tato mūrdhno'ṣṭāviṁśati bhaktād bhāgaśeṣaḥ padapiṇḍaḥ syāt |
T02n2965u_001:28: punastristheṣu śuddhamāseṣu madhyasthānīśairhato'dhaḥ unacatvāriṁśadbhā galabdhena dvimiśrabhyo na ṣaṣṭhyāghaṭībhirvibhajyaḥ bhāgaśeṣo nakṣatraghaṭījñeyā
T02n2965u_001:32: yadā varṣa rāśau varṣam śuddhamāsa piṇḍemāsaśca na praveśyate |
T02n2965u_001:33: tadā pratimāsaṁ vāradaṇḍapadapiṇḍāvayaveṣu yathākramame ko dvātriṁśat dvāvekaśca deyaḥ ṛtyutra ghaṭyordve rūdraśca deyaḥ |
T02n2965u_001:36: tithibhogārthañca śuklapratipadādi vartamānamāsasya gatavartamānatithayo yathāsaṁkhyā deyā heyāḥ punardeyā vāranāḍīpadeṣu |
T02n2965u_001:37: piṇḍacaturdaśabhāgaṁ labdhayordvayoścaturthaṁ lābhe vā piṇḍaḥ samo deyaḥ |
T02n2965u_001:42: tena triṁśat tithi sahitāḥ saptapañcāśadūrdhvaṁ na bhavanti |
T02n2965u_001:43: same deyāni candrapadāni viṣame heyāni bhāgaśeṣe tu śūnye śūnyamviśuddhaṁ tridaśaśaśipade pañcanetrārkkayordik tithyākhyaikādaśe'gnau daśajaladhipade viṁśatiścaikahīnāḥ |
T02n2965u_001:44: dvāviṁśatpañcarandhre ṛtuvasuni jināḥ saptame pañcaviṁśat tasminarkkaprabhedaiḥ prakaṭitaravikā deya heyāḥ samastā |
T02n2965u_001:45: viśuddhamiti na kiñcid deyaṁ heyaṁ vā |
T02n2965u_001:48: sūryasya ṛṇaṁ tasmin sūryasya ṛṇaṁ sūryasya dhanaṁ tasmin dhanamiti sūrya prabhedaḥ |
T02n2965u_001:49: etaduktam-vakṣyamāṇa nyāyena bhūtādibhāgalabdhaṁ miśrayitvā tyaktā vāraṁ vicaraṇapadāni piṇḍitāni bhavanti tāvadraviyākhyaṁ yadi sūryabhoge deyam |
T02n2965u_001:52: dvayameva candrasya śuddharavikā candraravikā candrapadāni bhūtabhūteṣu vedāḥ śikhikaraśaśinaḥ pūrvabhāge'pare ca |
T02n2965u_001:53: pūrve bhāge ūrdhvacandrakrameṇamadhye tiryagrekhāṁ datvā apare adhaḥ śaśyāinā vyatikrameṇa likhanīyāmīti caturddaśa |
T02n2965u_001:55: atra caturddaśabhāgaśeṣeṇa pratipādikaṁ saccāra padaṁ taduparimaṁ saccāraḥ |
T02n2965u_001:59: aparārddhena tat tyaktvā'bhuktapadameva vāraghaṭikāsthāne deyaṁ heyaṁ vā |
T02n2965u_001:60: etaduktam-vakṣyamāṇa nyāyena bhūtādibhāgalabdhaṁ miśrayitvā tyaktā sa ravicaraṇapadāni piṇḍitāni yāvanti bhavanti tāvadravikākhyaṁ yadi sūryabhoge deyam |
T02n2965u_001:64: dvayameva candrasya śuddharavikā candraravikā candrapadāni bhūtābhūteṣu vaidāḥ śikhikaraśaśinaḥ pūrvabhāge'pare ca |
T02n2965u_001:65: pūrve bhāge ūrdhvamanukrameṇa madhye tiryagrekhāṁ datvā apare bhāvaḥ śaśyādinā vyatikrameṇa likhanīyāmīti caturddaśa |
T02n2965u_001:67: atra caturddaśabhāgaśeṣeṇa pratipāditaṁ saccāra padaṁ taduparimaṁ saccāraḥ |
T02n2965u_001:71: aparārddhe tu tat tyaktvā'bhuktapadameva vāraghaṭikāsthāne deyaṁ heyaṁ vā |
T02n2965u_001:72: kiṁ īha loke ravikā aśuddhā ataḥ śuddharavikārtham |
T02n2965u_001:75: pratidinasūryasya nakṣatra bhogārthaṁ śuklādinokta tithirdvisthāne kṛtya ekatra caturddaṇḍe hatā |
T02n2965u_001:76: aparatra ca karaṇanyāyena viṁśatyā dvāviṁśatyā vā pāṇīpalaiḥ |
T02n2965u_001:77: siddhānta nyāsena vā ṣaḍviṁśati pāṇipalairhṛtvā ṣaṣṭyā hṛtvā labdhamūparipraveśyoparim daṇḍārapi ṣaṣṭyā hṛtvā labdha ṛkṣe bhāgaśeṣaḥ ṛkṣadaṇḍa prakṣipet |
T02n2965u_001:79: nakṣatrataddaṇḍapiṇḍapāṇīpaleṣu dvisthāne kṛteṣvakatra ravikārthaṁ sa tripade ṣaḍnakṣatrāṇi śodhyāni |
T02n2965u_001:87: atra yadi ṛṇamadhikaṁ bhoga rāśi hīnā tadā saptaviṁśati nakṣatracakraṛkṣasthāne prakṣipya śodhyam |
T02n2965u_001:92: ṛkṣāt ṣaṣṭihṛtādadhaḥstha ghaṭikāyuktā bhūtavahnīcandrabhāgalabdhaṁ rāśicaraṇapratipādakaṁ lopyaṁ rāśicaraṇaṁ jñātvā |
T02n2965u_001:93: rasayugamaśaśino mandakārye ṣaṭrāśipadāni pañcakurkkādiṣḥu janmarāśiṣu bhavanti |
T02n2965u_001:94: iyantyeva padāni sarvagrahāṇāṁ mandakārye bhūtādinā bhāgā lābhe tu prathamavārapade grahosthīti jñeyaṁ sarvatra |
T02n2965u_001:95: tadā tena hṛtānya ityādi vakṣyamāṇaṁ kāryaṁ |
T02n2965u_001:96: tadā mandakārye sarvagrahāṇāṁ krameṇa ṛṇamut krameṇa dhanaṁ śeyam |
T02n2965u_001:97: tato bhukta padāt dvitīyo bhujyat i bhogaḥ |
T02n2965u_001:98: tena hṛtābhyo bhāga śeṣa nāḍibhyo bhūtādi bhāga bhogāṁśena sārddhaṁ pūrvārddhe rāśi vaśāt grahabhuktāni caraṇāni piṇḍitāni |
T02n2965u_001:99: aparārddhe tu bhāga labdhaṁ bhogāṁśaṁ tyaktvā'pareṇa bhogāṁśena sahābhuktāni caraṇapadāni piṇḍitāni dhanaṁ ṛṇavaśād deyāni heyāni vā grahabhoga nāḍyāmiyameva sūryasya śuddha ravikā |
T02n2965u_001:103: idānīṁ sūryasyāśuddharavikāḥ kathyante- sūrye kālo raso'hiśca daśaharaharā rūdradignāgaṣaṭ ca ||
T02n2965u_001:105: vahniḥ khañcāyanānte bhavati dhanamṛṇaṁ cottare dakṣiṇe ca ṣaṇmāsaṁ pakṣa bhedaiścarita dinakaro māsasaṅkrāntibhedāditi |
T02n2965u_001:108: evaṁ yāvad dhanuṣi vahniḥ khaṁcāyanānte evaṁ makarādau dhanamiti |
T02n2965u_001:109: candrasya nakṣatrabhogārthaṁ sūryabhoge nakṣatrasthāne śuklādinoktatithayo deyāḥ |
T02n2965u_001:110: tadanu tāstithayaḥ sthānāntare rasahutā vārasya bhoga ghaṭikādibhirmiśrāḥ sūryasya ṛṇaghaṭī |
T02n2965u_001:114: śuklādi noktatithayordvihatā ekarahitāḥ sambhave sati saptabhāgāvaśeṣāḥ karaṇaṁ syāt |
T02n2965u_001:128: nakṣatrāṇi aśvinī bharaṇī kṛtikā rohiṇī mṛgaśirā ārdrā punarvasuḥ puṣya aśleṣā maghā pūrvafālgunī uttarafālgunī hastā citrā svātī viśākhā anurādhā jyeṣṭhā mūlā pūrvāṣādā uttarāṣādā śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā pūrvabhādrapadāṁ uttarabhādrapadā raivatī ceti saptaviṁśatiḥ |
T02n2965u_001:130: viṣkambhaḥ prītirāyuṣmān saubhāgyaḥ śobhano atigaṇḍaḥ sukarmmā dhṛtiḥ śūlaḥ gaṇḍo vṛddhiḥ dhruvoḥ vyāghāto harṣaṇo vajraḥ siddhiḥ vyatīpāto varīyān parighaḥ śivaḥ siddhaḥ sādhyaḥ śubhaḥ śuklo brahyā aindre vaidhṛtiśceti saptaviṁśatiḥ |
T02n2965u_001:131: karaṇānibhavaṁ bālavaṁ kaulavaṁ taitilaṁ garajaṁ vaṇijaṁ viṣṭiriti sapta |
T02n2965u_001:133: tatra śuklapratipadaparārddhātprabhṛti pratyekaṁ catuḥ praharabhogaṁ saṅkhyayā yathākramaṁ punaḥ punarāvarttya kṛṣṇacaturddaśyāḥ pūrvārddha yāvatsaptānāṁ bhogaḥ syāt |
T02n2965u_001:139: evaṁ pratyekaṁ navapādairdvādaśameṣa vṛṣamithuna karkkaṭa siṁha kanyā tulā vṛścika dhanurmakarakumbha mīnā rāśayo vaiśākhādiṣu jñeyāḥ |
T02n2965u_001:141: śauriśauriguravaśca sammatāḥ kṣatriṇa kramata eṣu rāśi sthiti ||
T02n2965u_001:144: pṛthagaṣṭamiśribhaiḥ śuddhābdairūnī kṛtāḥ saptadaśādhikaśatatrayabhāgena labdhādvimiśrā vārā bhavanti |
T02n2965u_001:145: bhāga śeṣebhyaḥ ṣaṣṭyāni hatyanāḍī kṛtebhyaḥ saptādi bhāga labdhā grāhyā bhāgaśeṣo lopyaḥ |
T02n2965u_001:149: atra yadā sūryo mīnaṁ tyaktvā meṣe yāti |
T02n2965u_001:150: tadā kṣipyanta iti kṣepakā dvādaśaḥ meṣādiṣu yathākramam |
T02n2965u_001:158: eṣu dvādaśa koṣṭānāṁ pratyekaṁ prathamo vāradhruve deyaḥ dvitīyaḥ saptapañcāśadādiko ghaṭī dhruve iti saṅkrāntirvāra tad bhogayo jñātavya karaṇe
T02n2965u_001:159: idānīṁ maṅgalādinām nakṣatrabhogārtham ahan gaṇa ucyate |
T02n2965u_001:160: śuddhamāsān dinarāśyarthaṁ triṁśad hatāśca śuklādinoktatithisahitāsristhāne kṛtvā'dho rāśeḥ śailakhāgairbhāgena labdhaṁ madhye deyam |
T02n2965u_001:161: tato madhyāccatuḥ ṣaṣṭibhāgalabdhena hīna upararāśira-sfuṭodinagaṇaḥ syāt |
T02n2965u_001:164: tadaikādikaṁ prathama rāśau deyaṁ heyaṁ vā yathā vāraḥ syāt |
T02n2965u_001:166: maṅgala śuddhārthaṁ sfuṭāhaggaṇāt saptaṣaṣṭyādhikaśatamiśrāt maṅgalamaṇḍaladinaiḥ śailanāgartubhirbhāgalabdhorāśiparivartto lopya evamanyeṣāmapi śeṣānnakṣatra hatāḥ svamaṇḍaladinairbhāgalabdhaṁ nakṣatra bhavatyupari |
T02n2965u_001:167: taccheṣācca ṣaṣṭi hatāt svamaṇḍaladinairbhāgalabdhān ghaṭyo'dhaḥ pūrvavatpāṇīpalādikaṁ idamṛṛkṣādikaṁ dvisthāne saṁsthāpya ekatra sārddha navanakṣatrāṇi śodhyāni |
T02n2965u_001:172: śīghra karmaṇi tu maṅgalagurūśani śuddhāṇāṁ mandakarmapariśuddhaṁ bhogaṁ dvisthāne kṛtvā |
T02n2965u_001:173: eko ravikā rahita sūryabhoge tithimiśre'śodhite akṛta sa tripāda ṣaḍnakṣatra tyājanādi vidhau śodhyaḥ |
T02n2965u_001:174: tataḥ sūryoktaṁ yadi ṛṇamityādi krama evetyantaṁ jñeyam |
T02n2965u_001:175: atra śīghra kārye krameṇa dhanaṁ deyamutkrameṇa ṛṇaṁ heyam |
T02n2965u_001:176: śodhi tasya yathā sambhavatyājitasya śeṣo grahacaraṇapratipādakapadaṁ labdhaṁ jñātvā lopyaḥ |
T02n2965u_001:177: tenaiva padena śeṣanāḍī nihatya ṣaṣṭibhāgena labdhinaḥ tatpadāṁśena sārddhaṁ pūrvārddhe rāśi caraṇavaśāt grahabhuktāni caraṇāni piṇḍitāni |
T02n2965u_001:178: aparārddhe tu bhāgalabdhaṁ tatpadāṁśaṁ tyaktvā'pareṇa tatpadāṁśena sahābhuktāni |
T02n2965u_001:179: aparatra mandakarmma śuddhe grahabhoge deyāni heyāni vā |
T02n2965u_001:180: atra padāni caturddaśa jinastridhā akṣividhoḥ karodviraṣṭādaśāhaḥ śivavahnimūlāt rūdrāṣṭa vahniḥ khabhujaṅgamādhastripañcadhai tāni mahī subhasya
T02n2965u_001:185: tathā mandasūryaṁ dvisthāne kṛtvā ekaṁ budhacāre śukracāre ca śodhayet |
T02n2965u_001:187: abhuktānītyantamanantaraṁ maṅgaloktaṁ kṛtvā'paratramandasūrye deyāni heyāni vā |
T02n2965u_001:192: dvākṣi doṣa tithicāṣṭau mūlāt ṣaṭ khāgrayastathā ||
T02n2965u_001:196: mandakarmmaṇi budhaśuddhyarthaṁ sfuṭadivasagaṇācchatahatādvahni sūryādrihīnādbuddhamaṇḍaladinaiḥ śailarandhādināśai bhāgalabdha ityādi pāṇīpalādi itītyantaṁ maṅgalavatkāryaṁ nakṣatrādi kamīdaṁ śīghrakarmārthaṁñcāra ucyate |
T02n2965u_001:197: atastadarthaṁ sthānāntare saṁsthāpya ravikā rahita sūryabhoga dvisthāne kṛtvekatra sūryabhoge sārddhaṣoḍaśanakṣatrāṇi śodhyāni |
T02n2965u_001:198: tataḥ sūryoktaṁ meṣetyādi dhanaṛṇavaśādityantaṁ kṛtvā'para sūryabhoge deyāni heyāni vā |
T02n2965u_001:201: ayamaparasūryabhogomandakarma śuddhabudhātmatāṅgataḥ śīghrakarmārthaṁ manda sūrya ucyate |
T02n2965u_001:204: gurūśuddhyartha sfuṭāhana gaṇāt khakharasanayanairūnādgurūmaṇḍaladinirdantavahnyābdhibhiḥ bhāgalabdhaṁ ityādi bhaumavatkāryam |
T02n2965u_001:206: śukraśuddhyarthaṁ sfuṭāhan gaṇād daśahatā caturaśī ṛnācchukramaṇḍaladinairadrijinākṣibhirbhāgalabdhaṁ ityādi budhavatkāryaṁ sarvam |
T02n2965u_001:207: ayaṁ tu viśeṣaḥ ṣaṭnakṣa [ trā] ṇi śodhyāni padāni śarayugaśaśinaḥ |
T02n2965u_001:208: śanaiścaraśuddhyarthaṁ sfuṭāhan gaṇāt khākṣyaṣṭavedairūnācchaurimaṇḍaladinaiḥ ṣaḍrasāgāmbaraikairbhāgalabdhaṁ ityādi bhaumavat kāryam |
T02n2965u_001:211: api ca mandakarmapariśuddho grahabhogaḥ śīghrakarmaṇā pariśuddhaḥ sanyakarmadvayena pariśuddha eva grahabhogo bhavati |
T02n2965u_001:212: na tu mandakarmapariśuddho bhinno grahabhogaḥ śīghrakarmāriśuddhabhinno iti kṣobhiḥ śāstravidaḥ |
T02n2965u_001:213: karmadvayena pariśuddha-bhogaśca maṅgalabudhagurūśukraśanaiścaraṇāmeva ravestu mandakarmaṇaiva śīghrakarmaṇaivendoriti |
T02n2965u_001:215: pūrṇimāyā candragrahārthamekapakṣamiśrebhyo'māvāsyāṁ sūryagrahārthaṁ dvipakṣamiśrebhyo rāhupakṣamaṇḍalaiḥ khaṛtvambhodhibhāgairlabdhaṁ lopyam
T02n2965u_001:216: bhāgaśeṣa pakṣebhya ṛkṣārthaṁ saptaviṁśati hatebhyaḥ khādinā labdhamṛkṣambhavati |
T02n2965u_001:220: anena nakṣatrādinā labdhenononi saptaviṁśatinakṣatrāṇi rāhomukhabhogo bhavati |
T02n2965u_001:222: tataḥ pratimāsaṁ sūryabhoge nakṣatradvayamekādaśaghaṭikāḥ ṣaṇmāsairdvādaśanakṣatrāṇi ṣaḍṣaṣṭighaṭikāḥ syū |
T02n2965u_001:224: atra sūryabhoge sūryagrahaṇe'māvāsyābhoge ravikā deyā heyā vā |
T02n2965u_001:225: tato rāhu bhoge pañcacatvāriṁśad ghaṭikādrūnītya śeṣaṁ nakṣatrabhogaṁ śodhayet |
T02n2965u_001:226: tatra yadi mukhena pucchena vā tulyaṁ nakṣatraṁ syāt tadaiva grahaṇaṁ nānyathā |
T02n2965u_001:227: athavā pūrvokta nyāyenānīyāyemāvāsyāṁ sūryabhogaṁ rāhormukhabhoge pucchabhoge vā śodhayet |
T02n2965u_001:228: candragrahaṇe tu pūrṇimāyāṁ candrabhogaṁ rāhormukhabhoge puccha bhoge vā śodhayet |
T02n2965u_001:229: mukhena pucchena vā saha tulyaṁ nakṣatratve grahaṇam |
T02n2965u_001:231: atra hi amāvasyāvasāne pūrṇimāvasāne vā parvasandhau rāhormaṇḍale raviśaśinormaṇḍalaṁ praviśanti maṇḍalaśabda gātra ṣaṣṭināḍikā ekanakṣatrabhogaḥ sa ca dvādaśarāśyātmakaḥ ṣoḍaśakalātmako veditavyaḥ |
T02n2965u_001:232: tatra yadi rāhubhoge'nayorbhogaḥ śuddhastadā sarvagrāsaḥ ṣaṣṭināikāparyataḥ |
T02n2965u_001:234: kalāyāścaturnāḍyātmikāyā rāhubhoge praviṣṭaṁ caturthāśaṁ yāvad graha samāgamo jñeyaḥ |
T02n2965u_001:235: yadā ca mukhabhoge rāhugrasati tadā pūrvabhāgam |
T02n2965u_001:237: evamanyadigvibhāgāniti balanaṁ jñeyamanyatreti ṭīkāgrahaṇaṁ cedaṁ ṣaṇmāsairevabhavatyava |
T02n2965u_001:240: amāvāsyāvasāne kāle śaśinopi sūrye praviṣṭatvāt sūryaṁ grasate iti |
T02n2965u_001:243: ketuḥ sūryamaṇḍale praviśya pratyahaṁ daṇḍacatuṣṭayaṁ ṣaḍviṁśati liptāścārkkabhogastamadhikasārddhaṁ liptā dvayañca śīghracāre krameṇāgrato vakracāre utkramena pṛṣṭato vicarati |
T02n2965u_001:247: ṣaṭpañcāśat liptātmikā ketoḥ māsamekaṁ yāvannirdhūmo nakṣatravaddṛśyate |
T02n2965u_001:249: evaṁ sārddhamāsānte punaḥ sūryamaṇdale tathaiva varṣatrayaṁ yāvadadṛśyā bhavati |
T02n2965u_001:253: śīghrakarmaṇi sūryamaṇḍalāduditasya grahasya kragamane caturdaśacaraṇaghaṭikārddha pūrvāddhe bhogaḥ śīghracāre ucyate |
T02n2965u_001:258: atra krame pūrvārddhe dhanavṛddhiḥ grahāśca pūrvābhimukhāḥ |
T02n2965u_001:262: eṣāmanyādiṅ mukhatvamariṣṭādivaśena prakṛtyā tu rāhuḥ paścimābhimukho merūṁ pradakṣiṇayatyapare grahāḥ |
T02n2965u_001:266: rātrau hāni dakṣiṇāgni balayaśīmnau mahāhimavadbalayaśīmā yāvatpañcasaptatiyojanasahasramuttarāyaṇe ṣaṇmāsaiḥ |
T02n2965u_001:267: evaṁ mahāhimabalayaśīmro dakṣiṇāgnibalayaśīmā yāvad dakṣiṇāyane rātrau vṛdhirahnihāniḥ |
T02n2965u_001:268: evaṁ sati pratyahorātraṁ liptā dvayasya hānirvṛddhirvā jñeyā |
T02n2965u_001:269: tathā bhoṭa līca cīnādideśeṣu sambhalaviṣayāntaṁ yāvannavāṣṭasaptabhāgairlabdhanāḍīnāṁ kailāśakhaṇḍe ṣaḍbhāgaiḥ pratyahorātraṁ kailāśa khaṇḍāntuttarasminya himagiri yāvatpratyahorātraṁ catuḥ śvāsādhika liptā trayasya hānirvṛddhirvā |
T02n2965u_001:271: asya madhye viśru ( ṣu ) va rekhā |
T02n2965u_001:272: atra evomaya pārśve cāpākaraḥ atra ca khalamadhyame dhīcandravalīvarddavad bhramanti nakṣatrāśyaśvinyādīni citrārddha yāvaduttare rekhāyāḥ |
T02n2965u_001:273: dakṣiṇe tu citrārddhādīni revatvantāni evameva sapāda nakṣatra dvayameka rāśiḥ |
T02n2965u_001:280: etacca nakṣatrādikaṁ sumerūmpradakṣiṇa yadrati balanavaśāt golākāraṁ bhavati |
T02n2965u_001:281: golāyā mānaṁ dakṣiṇāgnibalayāt mahāhimavantaṁ yāvat pañcasaptatri ( ti )
T02n2965u_001:283: ebhyo maṇḍaladinārddha sārddhadvāśītiśatabhāgalabdhaṁ digvibhāga pratidinaṁ tyajati sūryaḥ |
T02n2965u_001:284: evaṁ dvādaśakhaṇḍeṣu tiryakkrāntiḥ sūryasya veditavyeti karaṇamārgaḥ |
T02n2965u_001:287: na sfuṭā vai bhavanyatra mūlanaṣṭā iva drumāḥ ||
T02n2965u_001:289: ataḥ siddhāntamārga ucyate ayaṁ kramaḥ sama bhūmyāṁ hastapramāṇamaṇḍalamadhyanā stavitasti pramāṇa śaṅkauśchāyā pūrvāhne rekhā bāhyāt krameṇa saṅgu cantī yadā maṇḍalaprāntarekhāyā madhyasthāne praviśati |
T02n2965u_001:290: tadā tatra sthāne cihnaṅkākapadaṅka saiva paścimādika |
T02n2965u_001:291: aparāhne tu maṇḍalamadhyāt krameṇa prasarantī yadetyādi |
T02n2965u_001:292: pūrvaccihnaṁ karttavyaṁ saiva pūrvādika atraika cihnoparisūtraṁ dhṛkā'paracihnādravāṅmaṇḍalaṁ khadikayā kuryāt |
T02n2965u_001:293: aparacihnopari ca sūtraṁ dhṛtvā tathā kuryāt |
T02n2965u_001:296: evaṁ diśo liṇḍīṁ yatre tatmaṇḍala dvayaṁ lopayitvā uttarāyaṇadināt prāgdaśamaṁ dinamārabhya madhyāhne parīkṣā karttavyā |
T02n2965u_001:299: yā yasmin dine taduttarāyaṇa saṅkrāntidinaṁ sūryasya |
T02n2965u_001:300: tena vāre tayā tithyā tena yogena tena karaṇena |
T02n2965u_001:304: tatra dhrūvake pratyahaṁ ṣaḍviṁśati pāṇīpalādhikadaṇḍacatuṣṭaya prakṣipya ravikā padāni śodhayet |
T02n2965u_001:305: pūrvoktena sa tripāda ṣaṭ nakṣatrāṇi śodhyānītyādi vidhinā |
T02n2965u_001:306: tathā cokta mūlatantre- ayanādeḥ pratyahaṁ deyo yāvad bhūyo'yanambhavet |
T02n2965u_001:309: evañca vāratithinakṣatrayogakaraṇarāśikṣetre saṅkrānti grahāṇāṁ falamanyāt sugamamiti neha pratanyat iti |
T02n2965u_001:310: uditamidamudānaṁ jyotirevat falaṁ prathitamiha hitānta kālacakra'vatīrya |
T02n2965u_001:311: gamayatu padabandhaṁ nirvibandhaṁ subuddhiḥ sukhamiti racitesminyakṣantu mahā sanaḥ |
T02n2965u_001:312: viraṁ tiriyamabhayasya pravicaya padavīntano tu hṛdayasya udita tamaḥ sukṛtañca trijagati jinasampadaḥ falatu |||
